abstract: Luke Donald wins Children's Miracle Network Hospitals Classic golf tournament; Justin Leonard finishes second.
snippet: Justin Leonard, who thought he would lose his exemption, and Luke Donald, the world No. 1, finished strong at Disney.
lead_paragraph: Justin Leonard, who thought he would lose his exemption, and Luke Donald, the world No. 1, finished strong at Disney.

headline.main: Reward at Either End of Money List
headline.print_headline: Reward at Either End of Money List
headline.seo: Donald Wins Disney; Leonard Regains Confidence
